body:
Day 66 - 1647*
Nah bro, are these really backwards? Who did such a shitty job while drawing these. Smh, at least they could put some more effort into this. Keep on grinding and you'll find some more like this, probably. Just be careful and dont become a "slave to the grind".
1/10.

The images in this set are backwards. They read right-to-left.

Nuts.
